combobox

combobox is an alt-punk band from Portland, Oregon founded by Tyler Schreiber and Zach Kay.

Origin Portland, Oregon, USA
Genres
  • Rock
  • Punk
Years active 2022-present
Links
  • https://www.combobox.band
  • https://soundcloud.com/user-413903244-326605094

Combobox is Zach Kay, Tyler Schreiber, Ben Hedwall, and Cody Iott.
